topics.body:
Honestly, I was trying to beat around the bush with that statement, so let must just be straight

[spoiler]At times I've wondered if I feel for Squiggy is actually love, or something else, and I just call it love
What if I don't actually know what love is, and I'm just using the word
It's terrible thinking about it[/spoiler]

topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55b46a8263687255dc000144#post_55b46a8263687255dc000144

"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55b469dc6368727708000f04#post_55b469dc6368727708000f04

Only one way to find out. Meet each other and see what comes out.

If after 3 weeks the sex is still entertaining then you're on a good path. If it doesn't work out, no one can say you didn't do what you could.

Save up from work and plan the trip properly. Either marc goes to Squig, or Squig goes to marc.

Here's the thing, if you two guys do want this to happen, you'll find a way to get this done. No one pressuring you to do it, neither no one forcing you to. It'll simply come to pass, savvy?

So no need to feel bad for being far apart. Now go back to french kiss or something, I'm grabbing a snack
